content.paragraph: 533. Cūḷahaṃsajātakaṃ (1)
content.gathalast: Gaccha tuvampi mā kaṅkhi, natthi baddhebandhebandhe sahāyatā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Gacche vāhaṃ na vā gacche, na tena amaro siyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā, dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jahe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Maraṇaṃ vā tayā saddhiṃ, jīvitaṃ vā tayā vinā;
content.gathalast: Tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve tayā vinā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ taṃ evaṃ gataṃ jahe;
content.gathalast: Yā gati tuyhaṃ sā mayhaṃ, ruccate vihagādhipa.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kā nu pāsena baddhassabandhassabandhassa , gati aññā mahānasā;
content.gathalast: Sā kathaṃ cetayānassa, muttassa tava ruccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kaṃ vā tvaṃ passase atthaṃ, mama tuyhañca pakkhima;
content.gathalast: Ñātīnaṃ vāvasiṭṭhānaṃ, ubhinnaṃ jīvitakkhaye.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ na kañcanadepiñcha depiccha (sī. pī.), dvepiccha (syā.), andhena tamasā gataṃ;
content.gathalast: Tādise sañcajaṃ pāṇaṃ, kamatthamabhijotaye’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu patataṃ seṭṭha, dhamme atthaṃ na bujjhasibujjhase ;
content.gathalast: Dhammo apacito santo, atthaṃ dasseti pāṇinaṃ.
Bhattiñca tayi sampassaṃ, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā eso sataṃ dhammo, yo mitto mittamāpade;
content.gathalast: Na caje jīvitassāpi, hetudhammamanussaraṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Svāyaṃ dhammo ca te ciṇṇo, bhatti ca viditā mayi;
content.gathalast: Kāmaṃ karassu mayhetaṃ, gacchevānumato mayā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Api tvevaṃ gate kāle, yaṃ khaṇḍaṃ baddhaṃ (sī.), bandhaṃ (pī.) ñātinaṃ mayā;
content.gathalast: Tayā taṃ buddhisampannaṃbuddhisampannabuddhisampannabuddhisampanna , assa paramasaṃvutaṃ.
Paccadissatha nesādo, āturānamivantako.
Tuṇhīmāsittha ubhayo, na sañcalesumāsanāna ca sañcesu’māsanāna ca sañcesu’māsanā .
Abhikkamatha vegena, dijasattu dijādhipe.
Paccakamitthapaccakampitthapaccakampitthapaccakampittha nesādo, baddhā iti vicintayaṃ.
Āsajja baddhamāsīnaṃ, pekkhamānamadīnavaṃ.
Pavaḍḍhakāye āsīne, dijasaṅghagaṇādhipe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ nu pāsena mahatā, baddho na kurute disaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atha kasmā abaddho tvaṃ, balī pakkhi na gacchasi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kinnu tyāyaṃtā’yaṃtā’yaṃtā’yaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi;
content.gathalast: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Rājā me so dijāmitta, sakhā pāṇasamo ca me;
content.gathalast: Neva naṃ vijahissāmi, yāva kālassa pariyāyaṃ.
Padañhetaṃ mahantānaṃ, boddhumarahanti āpadaṃ.
Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhati.
Guyhamāsajjagūḷhamāsajjagūḷhamāsajja bajjhanti, athevaṃ jīvitakkhaye’’.
Api no anumaññāsi, api no jīvitaṃ dade’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na ceva me tvaṃ baddhosi, napi icchāmi te vadhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kāmaṃ khippamito gantvā, jīva tvaṃ anigho ciraṃ’’.
Sace ekena tuṭṭhosi, muñcetaṃ mañca bhakkhaya.
Na te lābhena jīvatthijīnatthijīnatthijīnatthi , etena niminā tuvaṃ.
Maṃ pubbe bandha pāsena, pacchā muñca dijādhipaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tāvadeva ca te lābho, katāssakatassākatassā yācanāya ca;
content.gathalast: Mitti ca dhataraṭṭhehi, yāvajīvāya te siyā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Passantu no mahāsaṅghā, tayā muttaṃ ito gataṃ;
content.gathalast: Mittāmaccā ca bhaccā ca, puttadārā ca bandhavā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na ca te tādisā mittā, bahūnaṃbahunnaṃbahunnaṃ idha vijjati;
content.gathalast: Yathā tvaṃ dhataraṭṭhassa, pāṇasādhāraṇo sakhā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘So te sahāyaṃ muñcāmi, hotu rājā tavānugo;
content.gathalast: Kāmaṃ khippamito gantvā, ñātimajjhe virocatha’’.
Ajjhabhāsatha vakkaṅgovaṅkaṅgo , vācaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
Yathāhamajja nandāmi, muttaṃ disvā dijādhipaṃ’’.
Lābhaṃ tavāyaṃyathāyaṃyathāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñcikañci na dakkhati.
Abaddhe pakatibhūte, kājekāce ubhayato ṭhite.
Ayañhi rājā haṃsānaṃ, ayaṃ senāpatītaro.
Patīto sumano vittocitto , bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ’’.
content.gatha2: Khippamantepuraṃ gantvā, rañño haṃse adassayi;
content.gathalast: Abaddhe pakatibhūte, kāje ubhayato ṭhite.
Ayañhi rājā haṃsānaṃ, ayaṃ senāpatītaro’’.
Kathaṃ luddo mahantānaṃ, issare idha ajjhagā’’.
Yaṃ yadāyatanaṃ maññe, dijānaṃ pāṇarodhanaṃ.
Taṃ abaddho upāsīno, mamāyaṃ ajjhabhāsatha.
Bhatturatthe parakkanto, dhammayuttodhamme yuttodhamme yutto vihaṅgamo.
Anutthunanto āsīno, bhattu yācittha jīvitaṃ.
Tato naṃ pāmuciṃpāmuñciṃpāmuñciṃ pāsā, anuññāsiṃ sukhena ca.
Ajjhabhāsatha vakkaṅgo, vācaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
Yathāhamajja nandāmi, muttaṃ disvā dijādhipaṃ.
Lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati.
Abaddhe pakatibhūte, kāje ubhayato ṭhite.
Ayañhi rājā haṃsānaṃ, ayaṃ senāpatītaro.
Patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ’.
Ettheva hi ime āsuṃassuassuassu , ubho anumatā mayā.
Mādisassa hi luddassa, janayeyyātha maddavaṃ.
Sabbasākuṇikāgāme, taṃ passa manujādhipa’’.
Ajjhabhāsatha vakkaṅgo, vācaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
Kacci raṭṭhamidaṃ phītaṃ, dhammena manusāsasi’’.
Atho raṭṭhamidaṃ phītaṃ, dhammena manusāsahaṃ’’ manusissati (sī. pī.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
content.gathalast: Kacci ca kaccinnu (sī. pī.) te tavatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
content.gathalast: Athopi te athopime (sī. pī.) mamatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ’’.
Puttarūpayasūpetā, tava chandavasānugā’’.
Puttarūpayasūpetā, mama chandavasānugā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bhavantaṃbhavaṃ tubhavaṃ tubhavannu kacci nu mahā-sattuhatthattataṃ hatthatthataṃ (sī. syā. pī.) gato;
content.gathalast: Dukkhamāpajji vipulaṃ, tasmiṃ paṭhamamāpade.
Evametesaṃ jammānaṃ, pātikaṃpākatikaṃpākatikaṃ bhavati tāvade’’.
Na cāyaṃ kiñci rasmāsu, sattūva samapajjatha.
Tadāyaṃ sumukhoyeva, paṇḍito paccabhāsatha.
Tato maṃ pāmucī pāsā, anuññāsi sukhena ca.
Bhoto sakāsegamanaṃ sakāse + āgamanaṃ, etassa dhanamicchatā’’.
Eso cāpi bahuṃ vittaṃ, labhataṃ yāvadicchatiyāvaticchatiyāvaticchati’’ .
Ajjhabhāsatha vakkaṅgaṃ, vācaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇaṃ’’.
Sabbatthissariyaṃ tava sabbatthissariyaṃ bhavataṃ (sī. syā. pī.), sabbissariyaṃ bhavataṃ (syā. ka.), taṃ pasāsapasāsathapasāsathapasāsatha yadicchatha.
Etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, issariyaṃisseraṃissaraṃ vissajāmi vo’’.
Kāmasā buddhisampanno, taṃ myāssa paramappiyaṃ’’.
Paṭivattuṃ na sakkomi, na me so vinayo siyā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Amhākañceva so yo (sī. pī.) seṭṭho, tvañca uttamasattavo;
content.gathalast: Bhūmipālo manussindo, pūjā bahūhi hetuhi.
Nantaraṃnāntaraṃnāntaraṃ paṭivattabbaṃ, pessenapesena manujādhipa’’.
Na heva akatattassa, nayo etādiso siyā.
Yāvatatthi mayā diṭṭhā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ.
Eso cāpi mamacchando, ciraṃ passeyya vo ubho’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ kiccaṃ yaṃkiñci (pī.) parame mitte, katamasmāsurasmāsurasmāsu taṃ tayā;
content.gathalast: Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhātyamhā , bhattirasmāsu yā tava.
Adassanena asmākaṃamhākaṃamhākaṃ , dukkhaṃ bahūsu pakkhisu.
Taṃ padakkhiṇato katvā, ñātiṃñātīñātīñātī passemurindamapassemarindamapassemarindama .
Eso cāpi mahā attho, ñātivissāsanā siyā’’.
Uttamaṃ javamanvāya uttamajavamattāya (sī. pī.), ñātisaṅghaṃ upāgamuṃ.
Kekāti makaruṃ haṃsā, puthusaddo ajāyatha.
Samantā parikiriṃsuparikariṃsuparikariṃsuparikariṃsu , aṇḍajā laddhapaccayā’’.
Haṃsā yathā dhataraṭṭhā, ñātisaṅghaṃ upāgamu’’nti.
content.paragraph: 534. Mahāhaṃsajātakaṃ (2)
content.gathalast: Harittaca hemavaṇṇa, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkama.
Anapekkhamānā gacchanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi.
Mā anīghāya hāpesi, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkama’’.
Jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ vā me, tayā saddhiṃ bhavissati.
Na maṃ anariyasaṃyutte, kamme yojetumarahasi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sakumāro sakhā tyasmi, sacitte casmi tesamitetyasmi te ṭhito;
content.gathalast: Ñāto senāpati tyāhaṃ, haṃsānaṃ pavaruttama.
content.gatha2: Taṃ hitvā patataṃ seṭṭha, kiṃ te vakkhāmito gato;
content.gathalast: Idha pāṇaṃ cajissāmi, nānariyaṃna anariyaṃ kattumussahe’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Eso hi dhammo sumukha, yaṃ tvaṃ ariyapathe ṭhito;
content.gathalast: Yo bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ maṃ, na pariccattumussahe.
Adhigacchasi tvaṃ mayhaṃ, evaṃ bhūtassa jīvitaṃ’’.
Daṇḍamādāya nesādo, āpatīāpadī turito bhusaṃ.
Aṭṭhāsi purato rañño, haṃso vissāsayaṃ byadhaṃbyathaṃbyathaṃbyathaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā;
content.gatha2: Ahaṃ yogaṃ payuñjissaṃ, yuttaṃ dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Tena pariyāpadānenapariyādānena , khippaṃ pāsā pamokkhasi’’.
Pahaṭṭhalomo nesādo, añjalissa paṇāmayi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na me sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, bhāsanto mānusiṃ dijo;
content.gathalast: Ariyaṃ bruvānobrūhantobrūhanto vakkaṅgo, cajanto mānusiṃ giraṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kinnu tāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi;
content.gathalast: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi’’.
Tamāpade pariccattuṃ, nussahe vihagādhipaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mahāgaṇāya bhattā me, mā eko byasanaṃ agā;
content.gathalast: Tathā taṃ samma nesāda, bhattāyaṃ abhito rame’’.
Cajāmi te taṃ bhattāraṃ, gacchathūbhogacchatu bho yathāsukhaṃ’’.
Paṭigaṇhāma te samma, etaṃ abhayadakkhiṇaṃ.
Anissaro muñcamamhe, theyyaṃ kayirāsi luddaka’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yassa tvaṃ bhatakobhaṭako rañño, kāmaṃ tasseva pāpaya;
content.gathalast: Tattha saṃyamanosaṃyamāno rājā, yathābhiññaṃ karissati’’.
Ubho hatthehi saṅgayhapaggayhapaggayha , pañjare ajjhavodahi.
Sumukhaṃ dhataraṭṭhañca, luddo ādāya pakkami’’.
content.gatha2: Bāḷhaṃ bhāyāmi sumukha, sāmāya lakkhaṇūruyā;
content.gathalast: Asmākaṃ vadhamaññāya, athattānaṃ vadhissati.
Koñcī samuddatīreva, kapaṇā nūna rucchati’’.
Ekitthimanusoceyya, nayidaṃ paññavatāmiva.
Bālo āmakapakkaṃva, lolo andhova āmisaṃ.
Kiccākiccaṃ na jānāsi, sampatto kālapariyāyaṃ.
Bahusādhāraṇā hetā, soṇḍānaṃva surāgharaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Māyā cesā marīcī ca, soko rogo cupaddavo;
content.gatha2: Kharā ca bandhanā cetā, maccupāsā guhāsayāpaccupāso guhāsayopaccupāso guhāsayo ;
content.gathalast: Tāsu yo vissase poso, so naresu narādhamo’’.
Mahābhūtitthiyo nāma, lokasmiṃ udapajjisuṃ.
content.gatha2: Bījāni tyāsu rūhanti, yadidaṃ sattā pajāyare;
content.gathalast: Tāsu ko nibbidenibbije poso, pāṇamāsajja pāṇibhipāṇahi .
Tassa tyajja bhaye jāte, bhītena jāyate mati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbo hi saṃsayaṃ patto, bhayaṃ bhīru titikkhati;
content.gathalast: Paṇḍitā ca mahantānomahattāno , atthe yuñjanti duyyuje.
Paṭibāhati yaṃ sūro, āpadaṃ attapariyāyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, rañño sūdā mahānase;
content.gathalast: Tathā hi vaṇṇo pattānaṃ, phalaṃ veḷuṃva taṃ vadhi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Muttopi na icchi nicchasi (ka.) uḍḍetuṃoḍḍetuṃ , sayaṃ bandhaṃ upāgami;
content.gathalast: Sopajja saṃsayaṃ patto, atthaṃ gaṇhāhi mā mukhaṃ’’.
Tava pariyāpadānena, mama pāṇesanaṃ cara’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā;
content.gatha2: Ahaṃ yogaṃ payuñjissaṃ, yuttaṃ dhammūpasaṃhitaṃdhammopasañhitaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Mama pariyāpadānena, khippaṃ pāsā pamokkhasi’’.
Paṭivedetha maṃ rañño, dhataraṭṭhāyamāgato’’.
Khalu saṃyamano rājā, amacce ajjhabhāsatha.
Kāmaṃ karo hiraññassa, yāvanto esa icchati’’.
Yadyāyaṃyadāyaṃyadāyaṃyadāyaṃ samma khemaka, puṇṇā haṃsehi tiṭṭhati.
Okiṇṇaṃ ñātisaṅghehi, nimmajjhimaṃnimajjhimaṃnimajjhimaṃnimajjhimaṃ kathaṃ gahi’’.
Padametassa anvesaṃ, appamatto ghaṭassito.
Tatthāhaṃ odahiṃ pāsaṃ, evaṃ taṃevetaṃevetaṃ dijamaggahiṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ludda dve ime sakuṇā, atha ekoti bhāsasi;
content.gathalast: Cittaṃ nu te vipariyattaṃvipariyatthaṃ , adu kinnu jigīsasijigiṃsasijigiṃsasi’’ .
Uraṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhanti, so me bandhaṃ upāgami.
Ariyaṃ bruvāno aṭṭhāsi, cajanto mānusiṃ giraṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Atha kiṃatha kinnuatha kinnukathaṃ nu dāni sumukha, hanuṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhasi;
content.gathalast: Adu me parisaṃ patto, bhayā bhīto na bhāsasi’’.
Nāhaṃ bhayā na bhāsissaṃ, vākyaṃ atthamhi tādise’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na te abhisaraṃ passe, na rathe napi pattike;
content.gathalast: Nāssa cammaṃ va kīṭaṃ vā, vammite ca dhanuggahe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nagaraṃ vā sumāpitaṃ;
content.gatha2: Okiṇṇaparikhaṃ duggaṃ, daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhakaṃ;
content.gathalast: Yattha paviṭṭho sumukha, bhāyitabbaṃ na bhāyasi’’.
Apathena pathaṃ yāma, antalikkhecarā mayaṃ.
Bhāsematthavatiṃ vācaṃ, sacce cassa patiṭṭhito.
Musāvādissa luddassa, bhaṇitampi subhāsitaṃ’’.
Abhayañca tayā ghuṭṭhaṃ, imāyo dasadhā disā.
Pahūtaṃ cādanaṃ tattha, ahiṃsā cettha pakkhinaṃ.
Te te bandhasma pāsena, etaṃ te bhāsitaṃ musā.
Ubho sandhimatikkamma, asātaṃ upapajjati’’.
Sutā ca paṇḍitātyattha, nipuṇā atthacintakā.
Tathā taṃ samma nesādo, vutto sumukha maggahi’’.
Bhāsematthavatiṃ vācaṃ, sampattā kālapariyāyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo migena migaṃ hanti, pakkhiṃ vā pana pakkhinā;
content.gathalast: Sutena vā sutaṃ kiṇyākiṇekiṇe , kiṃ anariyataraṃ tato.
Ubho so dhaṃsate lokā, idha ceva parattha ca.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na majjetha yasaṃ patto, na byādhebyathebyathe pattasaṃsayaṃ;
content.gathalast: Vāyametheva kiccesu, saṃvare vivarāni ca.
Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, evaṃteeveteevete tidivaṃ gatā.
Dhataraṭṭhañca muñcāhi, haṃsānaṃ pavaruttamaṃ’’.
Pañjarato pamokkhāmi, dhataraṭṭhaṃ yasassinaṃ.
Yo sukhe sukhito raññeraññoraññoraññorañño , dukkhite hoti dukkhito.
Yathāyaṃ sumukho rañño, pāṇasādhāraṇo sakhā’’.
Maṭṭhaṃ kāsikamatthannaṃkāsikapatthiṇṇaṃkāsikavatthinaṃkāsikavatthinaṃ , dhataraṭṭho upāvisi.
Sumukho ajjhupāvekkhi, dhataraṭṭhassanantarā anantaraṃ (sī.).
Haṃsānaṃ abhihāresuṃ, aggarañño pavāsitaṃ’’.
Kusalo khattadhammānaṃ, tato pucchi anantarā.
Kacci raṭṭhamidaṃ phītaṃ, dhammena manusāsasi’’.
Atho raṭṭhamidaṃ phītaṃ, dhammenaṃ manusāsahaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
content.gathalast: Kacci ca te tavatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
content.gathalast: Athopi te mamatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ’’.
Puttarūpayasūpetā, tava chandavasānugā’’.
Puttarūpayasūpetā, mama chandavasānugā’’.
Asāhasena dhammena, samena manusāsasi’’.
Asāhasena dhammena, samena manusāsahaṃ’’.
No ce ca (syā. ka.) dhammaṃ niraṃkatvā, adhammamanuvattasi’’.
Dhammamevānuvattāmi, adhammo me niraṅkato’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kacci nānāgataṃkacci nunāgataṃkacci nunāgataṃ dīghaṃ, samavekkhasi khattiya;
content.gathalast: Kacci mattona matto madanīye, paralokaṃ na santasi’’.
Ṭhito dasasu dhammesu, paralokaṃ na santasesantasiṃ .
Akkodhaṃ avihiṃsañca, khantiñcakhantī ca avirodhanaṃ.
Tato me jāyate pīti, somanassañcanappakaṃ.
Bhāvadosamanaññāya, asmākāyaṃ vihaṅgamo.
Yānasmāsuyānasmāsuyānasmāsuyānasmāsu na vijjanti, nayidaṃna idaṃna idaṃ paññavatāmiva’’.
Dhataraṭṭhe ca baddhasmiṃ, dukkhaṃ me vipulaṃ ahu.
Asmākaṃ adhipannānaṃ, khamassu rājakuñjara’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etaṃevaṃevaṃ te anumodāma, yaṃ bhāvaṃ na nigūhasi;
content.gathalast: Khilaṃ pabhindasi pakkhi, ujukosi vihaṅgama’’.
Rajataṃ jātarūpañca, muttā veḷuriyā bahū.
content.gatha2: Ajinaṃ dantabhaṇḍañca, lohaṃ kāḷāyasaṃ bahuṃ;
content.gathalast: Etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, issariyaṃisseraṃissaraṃissaraṃissaraṃ vissajāmi vo’’.
Dhammesu vattamānānaṃ, tvaṃ no ācariyo bhava.
Taṃ padakkhiṇato katvā, ñātiṃñātīñātīñātī passemurindamapassemarindamapassemarindama’’ .
Kāsirājā anuññāsi, haṃsānaṃ pavaruttamaṃ’’.
Pekkhato kāsirājassa, bhavanā te bhavanato (syā. ka.) vigāhisuṃ’’.
Kekāti makaruṃ haṃsā, puthusaddo ajāyatha.
Samantā parikiriṃsu, aṇḍajā laddhapaccayā’’.
Haṃsā yathā dhataraṭṭhā, ñātisaṅghaṃ upāgamu’’nti.

content.gatha1: ‘‘Neva kiṇāmi napi vikkiṇāmi, na cāpi me sannicayo ca atthiidhatthi ;
content.gathalast: Sukiccharūpaṃ vatidaṃ parittaṃ, patthodano nālamayaṃ duvinnaṃ’’.
Bahumhā bahukaṃ dajjā, adānaṃ nupapajjatina upapajjatina upapajjati .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ taṃ vadāmi kosiya, dehi dānāni bhuñja ca;
content.gathalast: Ariyamaggaṃ samārūhaariyaṃ maggaṃ samāruhaariyaṃ maggaṃ samāruha , nekāsī labhate sukhaṃ’’.

Doṇe timbarutitthasmiṃ, sīghasote mahāvahe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Atra cassa hutaṃ hoti, atra cassa samīhitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atithismiṃ yo nisinnasmiṃ, neko bhuñjati bhojanaṃ.

content.gathalast: Ariyamaggaṃ samārūha, nekāsī labhate sukhaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Uḷāravaṇṇā vata brāhmaṇā ime, ayañca vo sunakho kissa hetu;
content.gathalast: Uccāvacaṃ vaṇṇanibhaṃ vikubbati, akkhātha no brāhmaṇā ke nu tumhe’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cando ca sūriyo casūriyo ca ubho idhāgatā, ayaṃ pana mātali devasārathi;
content.gathalast: Sakkohamasmi tidasānamindo, eso ca kho pañcasikhoti vuccati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇissarā mudiṅgā camutiṅgā camutiṅgā camutiṅgā ca , murajālambarāni ca;
content.gathalast: Suttamenaṃ pabodhenti, paṭibuddho ca nandati’’.
Idheva nikkhippa sarīradehaṃ, kāyassa bhedā nirayaṃ vajanti’’.
Idheva nikkhippa sarīradehaṃ, kāyassa bhedā sugatiṃ vajanti’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tvaṃ nosi ñāti purimāsu jātisu, so maccharī rosako kosiyo (syā. ka.) pāpadhammo;
content.gathalast: Taveva atthāya idhāgatamhā, mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ gamittha’’ apattha (ka. sī. syā. pī.).
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā hi maṃ vo hitakāmā, yaṃ maṃ samanusāsatha;
content.gathalast: Sohaṃ tathā karissāmi, sabbaṃ vuttaṃ hitesibhi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Esāhamajjeva upāramāmi, na cāpihaṃna cāpahaṃna cāpahaṃ kiñci kareyya pāpaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na cāpi me kiñci adeyyamatthi, na cāpidatvā udakaṃ pivāmiudakampahaṃ pibe .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Evañca me dadato sabbakālaṃsabbakāle , bhogā ime vāsava khīyissanti;
content.gathalast: Tato ahaṃ pabbajissāmi sakka, hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni’’.
Athāgamā isivaro sabbalokagū, supupphitaṃ dumavarasākhamādiya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Suciṃ sugandhaṃ tidasehi sakkataṃ, pupphuttamaṃ amaravarehi sevitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Aladdha maccehi va dānavehi vā, aññatra devehi tadārahaṃ hidaṃhitaṃ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tato catasso kanakattacūpamā, uṭṭhāya nāriyo pamadādhipā muniṃ;
content.gathalast: Āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirī, iccabravuṃ nāradadeva brāhmaṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace anuddiṭṭhaṃ tayā mahāmuni, pupphaṃ imaṃ pārichattassa brahme;
content.gathalast: Dadāhi no sabbā gati te ijjhatu, tuvampi no hohi yatheva vāsavo.
Na mayhamatthatthi imehi koci naṃ, yāyeva vo seyyasi sā piḷandhathapiḷayhathapiḷayhatha’’ .
Yassā hi no nārada tvaṃ padassasi, sāyeva no hehiti seṭṭhasammatā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Akallametaṃ vacanaṃ sugatte, ko brāhmaṇo saṃkalahaṃ udīraye;
content.gathalast: Gantvāna bhūtādhipameva pucchatha, sace na jānātha idhuttamādhamaṃ’’.
Sakāsesakāsaṃ gantvāna sahassacakkhuno, pucchiṃsu bhūtādhipaṃ kā nu seyyasi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tā disvā āyattamanā purindado, iccabravī devavaro katañjalī;
content.gathalast: Sabbāva vo hotha sugatte sādisī, ko neva bhadde kalahaṃ udīrayi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo sabbalokaccaritosabbalokaṃ carakosabbalokaṃ carakosabbalokaṃ carako mahāmuni, dhamme ṭhito nāradonārada saccanikkamo;
content.gatha2: So nobravibravībravībravī girivare gandhamādane, gantvāna bhūtādhipameva pucchatha;
content.gathalast: Sace na jānātha idhuttamādhamaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Asuasū brahāraññacaro mahāmuni, nādatvā bhattaṃ varagatte bhuñjati;
content.gathalast: Viceyya dānāni dadāti kosiyo, yassā hi so dassati sāva seyyasi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Asū hi yo sammati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gaṅgāya tīre himavantapassanihimavantapasmanihimavantapasmanihimavantapasmani ;
content.gathalast: Sa kosiyo dullabhapānabhojano, tassa sudhaṃ pāpaya devasārathi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sa so (syā.) mātalī devavarena pesito, sahassayuttaṃ abhiruyha sandanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sukhippamevasa khippamevasa khippameva upagamma assamaṃ, adissamāno munino sudhaṃ adā’’.
Sabbāni bhūtāni adhiccaaticcaaticca vāsavo, ko neva me pāṇisu kiṃ sudhodahi.
Adiṭṭhapubbaṃ mama jātu cakkhubhi jātacakkhuhi (sī. pī.), kā devatā pāṇisu kiṃ sudhodahi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahaṃ mahindena mahesi pesito, sudhābhihāsiṃ turito mahāmuni;
content.gathalast: Jānāsi maṃ mātali devasārathi, bhuñjassu bhattuttama mābhivārayimā vicārayimā vicārayi .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Bhuttā ca sā dvādasa hanti pāpake, khudaṃ pipāsaṃ aratiṃ daraklamaṃdarathaṃ kilaṃdarathakkhamaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Kodhūpanāhañca vivādapesuṇaṃ, sītuṇhatandiñca rasuttamaṃ idaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na kappatī mātali mayha bhuñjituṃ, pubbe adatvā iti me vatuttamaṃ;
content.gathalast: Na cāpi ekāsnamarīyapūjitaṃekāsanaṃ ariyapūjitaṃekāsanaṃ ariyapūjitaṃ , asaṃvibhāgī ca sukhaṃ na vindati’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Thīghātakā ye cime pāradārikā, mittadduno ye ca sapanti subbate;
content.gathalast: Sabbe ca te maccharipañcamādhamā, tasmā adatvā udakampi nāsniyenāsmiyenāsmiye .
content.gatha1: ‘‘So hitthiyā vā purisassa vā pana, dassāmi dānaṃ vidusampavaṇṇitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Saddhā vadaññū idha vītamaccharā, bhavanti hete sucisaccasammatāsammasammatā’’ .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ato matāmutāmutā devavarena pesitā, kaññā catasso kanakattacūpamā;
content.gathalast: Āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirīsirī hirī tato , taṃ assamaṃ āgamuāgamuṃāgamuṃāgamuṃ yattha kosiyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tā disvā sabbo paramappamoditosabbā paramappamoditā , subhena vaṇṇena sikhārivaggino;
content.gathalast: Kaññā catasso caturo catuddisā, iccabravī mātalino ca sammukhā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Purimaṃ disaṃ kā tvaṃ pabhāsi devate, alaṅkatā tāravarāva osadhī;
content.gathalast: Pucchāmi taṃ kañcanavelliviggahe, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sirāha devīmanujebhi manujesu (sī. syā. pī.) pūjitā, apāpasattūpanisevinī sadā;
content.gathalast: Sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājaya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yassāhamicchāmi sudhaṃsukhaṃ mahāmuni, so sa (sī. pī.) sabbakāmehi naro pamodati;
content.gathalast: Sirīti maṃ jānahi jūhatuttama, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājaya’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sippena vijjācaraṇena buddhiyā, narā upetā paguṇā sakammunāsakammanāsakammanā ;
content.gathalast: Tayā vihīnā na labhanti kiñcanaṃkiñcinaṃ , tayidaṃ na sādhu yadidaṃ tayā kataṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Passāmi posaṃ alasaṃ mahagghasaṃ, sudukkulīnampi arūpimaṃ naraṃ;
content.gathalast: Tayānugutto siri jātimāmapijātimaṃ api , peseti dāsaṃ viya bhogavā sukhī.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ taṃ asaccaṃ avibhajjaseviniṃ, jānāmi mūḷhaṃ vidurānupātiniṃ;
content.gathalast: Na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasi’’.
Osittavaṇṇaṃ paridayha sobhasi, kusaggirattaṃ apiḷayha mañjariṃ.
Ko te dutīyo idha mandalocane, na bhāyasi ekikā kānane vane’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na me dutīyo idha matthi kosiya, masakkasārappabhavamhi devatā;
content.gathalast: Āsā sudhāsāya tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājaya’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Āsāya yanti vāṇijā dhanesino, nāvaṃ samāruyha parenti aṇṇave;
content.gathalast: Te tattha sīdanti athopi ekadā, jīnādhanā enti vinaṭṭhapābhatā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Āsāya khettāni kasanti kassakā, vapanti bījāni karontupāyaso;
content.gathalast: Ītīnipātena avuṭṭhitāyaavuṭṭhikāyaavuṭṭhikāya vā, na kiñci vindanti tato phalāgamaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Athattakārāni karonti bhattusu, āsaṃ purakkhatvā narā sukhesino;
content.gathalast: Te bhatturatthā atigāḷhitā puna, disā panassanti aladdha kiñcanaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Hitvāna jahitva (sī. syā. pī.) dhaññañca dhanañca ñātake, āsāya saggādhimanā sukhesino;
content.gathalast: Tapanti lūkhampi tapaṃ cirantaraṃ, kumaggamāruyhakummaggamāruyhakummaggamāruyhakummaggamāruyha parenti duggatiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Āsā visaṃvādikasammatā ime, āse sudhāsaṃsudhāyasudhāyasudhāya vinayassu attani;
content.gathalast: Na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasi’’.
Pucchāmi taṃ kañcanavelliviggahe, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatā’’.
Sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājaya’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dānaṃ damaṃ cāgamathopi saṃyamaṃ, ādāya saddhāya karonti hekadā;
content.gathalast: Theyyaṃ musā kūṭamathopi pesuṇaṃ, karonti heke puna viccutā tayā.
Vinetvānavinetvāvinetvāvinetvā chandaṃ kulitthiyāsupikuladhītiyāsupikuladhītiyāsupi , karoti saddhaṃ punapanapana kumbhadāsiyā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tvameva saddhe paradārasevinī, pāpaṃ karosi kusalampi riñcasi;
content.gathalast: Na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasi’’.
Tathūpamā maṃ paṭibhāsi devate, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi accharā.
Kā tiṭṭhasi mandamigāvalokayaṃmandamivāvalokayaṃmandamivāvalokayaṃ , bhāsesamānāva giraṃ na muñcasi’’.
content.gatha2: Sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, sāhaṃ na sakkomi sudhampi yācituṃ;
content.gathalast: Kopīnarūpā viya yācanitthiyā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dhammena ñāyena sugatte lacchasi, eso hi dhammo na hi yācanā sudhā;
content.gathalast: Taṃ taṃ ayācantimahaṃ nimantaye, sudhāya yañcicchasi tampi dammi te.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sā tvaṃ mayā ajja sakamhi assame, nimantitā kañcanavelliviggahe;
content.gathalast: Tuvañhi me sabbarasehi pūjiyā, taṃ pūjayitvāna sudhampi asniye’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sā kosiyenānumatā jutīmatā, addhā hiri rammaṃ pāvisi yassamaṃ;
content.gathalast: Udakavantaṃudaññavantaṃudaññavantaṃ phalamariyapūjitaṃ, apāpasattūpanisevitaṃ sadā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Rukkhaggahānā bahukettha pupphitā, ambā piyālā panasā ca kiṃsukā;
content.gathalast: Sobhañjanā loddamathopi padmakā, kekā ca bhaṅgā tilakā supupphitā.
Uddālakā pāṭali sinduvārakāsinduvāritā , manuññagandhā mucalindaketakā.
Mocā kadalī bahukettha sāliyo, pavīhayo ābhūjino ca ābhujinopi (sī. syā.) taṇḍulā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘tassa ca uttare passetassa ca uttare passeTassevuttarapassenatassa ca uttarapassena , jātā pokkharaṇī sivā;
content.gathalast: Akakkasā apabbhārā, sādhu appaṭigandhikā.
content.gatha2: Siṅgū savaṅkā saṃkulāsakulāsakulāsakulā , satavaṅkā ca rohitā;
content.gathalast: Āḷigaggarakākiṇṇā, pāṭhīnā kākamacchakā.
content.gatha2: Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā;
content.gathalast: Kuṇālakā bahū citrā, sikhaṇḍī jīvajīvakā.
Sīhā byagghā varāhā ca, acchakokataracchayo.
content.gatha2: Eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā;
content.gathalast: Kadalimigā bahukettha, biḷārā sasakaṇṇikāsasakaṇṇakā .
content.gatha2: Tassā susambandhasiraṃ kusāmayaṃ, suciṃ sugandhaṃ ajinūpasevitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Atriccaatricchaatricchaatriccha kocchaṃ hirimetadabravi, ‘nisīda kalyāṇi sukhayidamāsanaṃ’.
Navehi pattehi sayaṃ sahūdakaṃ, sudhābhihāsī turito mahāmuni.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sā taṃ paṭiggayha ubhohi pāṇibhi, iccabravi attamanā jaṭādharaṃ;
content.gathalast: ‘Handāhaṃ etarahi pūjitā tayā, gaccheyyaṃ brahme tidivaṃ jitāvinī’.
Sakāse gantvāna sahassacakkhuno, ayaṃ sudhā vāsava dehi me jayaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tamenatamenaṃtamenaṃ sakkopi tadā apūjayi, sahindadevāsahindā ca devāsahindā ca devā surakaññamuttamaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sā pañjalī devamanussapūjitā, navamhi kocchamhi yadā upāvisi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tameva saṃsītameva asaṃsī punadeva mātaliṃ, sahassanetto tidasānamindo;
content.gatha2: Gantvāna vākyaṃ mama brūhi kosiyaṃ, āsāya saddhāsaddha siriyā ca kosiya;
content.gathalast: Hirī sudhaṃ kena malattha hetunā.
Jambonadīsaṃ tapaneyyasannibhaṃ santikaṃ (sī.pī.), alaṅkataṃ kañcanacittasannibhaṃ.
Eṇeyyakā laṅghamayettha pakkhinopakkhiyopakkhiyo , migettha veḷuriyamayā yudhā yutā.
Alaṅkate kañcanajāluracchade, āveḷine saddagame asaṅgite.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ yānaseṭṭhaṃ abhiruyha mātali, disā imāyodasa disā imādasa disā imādasa disā imā abhinādayittha;
content.gathalast: Nabhañca selañca vanappatiniñcavanaspatīni cavanaspatīni cavanappatiñcavanappatiñca , sasāgaraṃ pabyadhayitthapabyāthayitthapabyāthayittha mediniṃ.
Bahussutaṃ vuddhaṃ vinītavantaṃ, iccabravī mātali devabrāhmaṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Indassa vākyaṃ nisāmehi kosiya, dūto ahaṃ pucchati taṃ purindado;
content.gathalast: Āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya, hirī sudhaṃ kena malattha hetunā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Andhā sirī maṃ paṭibhāti mātali, saddhā aniccā pana devasārathi;
content.gathalast: Āsā visaṃvādikasammatā hi me, hirī ca ariyamhi guṇe patiṭṭhitā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kumāriyo yācimā gottarakkhitā, jiṇṇā ca yā yā ca sabhattuitthiyo;
content.gathalast: Tā chandarāgaṃ purisesu uggataṃ, hiriyā nivārenti sacittamattano.
Hiriyā nivattanti jahitvajahitvānajahitvāna jīvitaṃ, te sampaṭicchanti punā hirīmanā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Velā yathā sāgaravegavārinī, hirāya hi pāpajanaṃ nivārinī;
content.gathalast: Taṃ sabbaloke hirimariyapūjitaṃ, indassa taṃ vedaya devasārathi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ko te imaṃ kosiya diṭṭhimodahi, brahmā mahindo atha vā pajāpati;
content.gathalast: Hirāya devesu hi seṭṭhasammatā, dhītā mahindassa mahesi jāyatha’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Handehi dāni tidivaṃ apakkamasamakkamasamakkama , rathaṃ samāruyha mamāyitaṃ imaṃidaṃidaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Indo ca taṃ indasagotta kaṅkhati, ajjeva tvaṃ indasahabyataṃ vaja’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ visujjhantisamijjhantisamijjhanti apāpakammino, atho suciṇṇassa phalaṃ na nassati;
content.gathalast: Ye keci maddakkhu sudhāya bhojanaṃ, sabbeva te indasahabyataṃ gatā’’.
Anuruddho pañcasikho, ānando āsi mātali.
Nārado sāriputtosi, sambuddho āsi vāsavo’’ti.
content.paragraph: 536. Kuṇālajātakaṃ (4)

Evamakkhāyati, evamanusūyatisuyyati . Sabbosadhadharaṇidhare nekapupphamālyavitate gaja-gavaja mahiṃsa-ruru-camara-pasada-khagga-gokaṇṇa-sīha-byaggha-dīpi-accha-koka-taraccha-uddāra-kadalimiga- biḷāra-sasa-kaṇṇikānucariteākiṇṇanelamaṇḍalamahāvarāhanāgakulakareṇu kaṇeru (sī. pī.) -saṅghādhivuṭṭhevutthevutthe issamiga- sākhamiga-sarabhamiga-eṇīmiga-vātamiga-pasadamiga-purisālupurisallupurisallu -kimpurisa-yakkha-rakkhasanisevite amajjavamañjarīdhara-pahaṭṭha brahaṭṭha (sī. pī.) -pupphaphusitaggā pupphitagga (sī. pī.) nekapādapagaṇavitatekurara-cakora-vāraṇa-mayūra-parabhata- jīvañjīvaka-celāvakā-bhiṅkāra-karavīkamattavihaṅgagaṇa-satata vihaṅgasata (sī. pī.) sampaghuṭṭheañjana-manosilā-haritāla- hiṅgulakahema-rajatakanakānekadhātusatavinaddhapaṭimaṇḍitappadese evarūpe khalu, bho, ramme vanasaṇḍe kuṇālo nāma sakuṇo paṭivasati ativiya citto ativiya cittapattacchadano.

Tasseva khalu, bho, kuṇālassa sakuṇassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthisahassāni paricārikā dijakaññāyo. Atha khalu, bho, dve dijakaññāyo kaṭṭhaṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvāḍasitvāḍasitvā taṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ majjhe nisīdāpetvā uḍḍentiḍentiḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ addhānapariyāyapathe kilamatho ubbāhetthā’’tiubbāhethā’’tiubbāhethā’’ti .
Pañcasatāpañcasata dijakaññāyo heṭṭhato heṭṭhato uḍḍentiḍentiḍenti – ‘‘sacāyaṃ kuṇālo sakuṇo āsanā paripatissati, mayaṃ taṃ pakkhehi paṭiggahessāmāti.
Pañcasatā dijakaññāyo uparūpari uḍḍentiḍentiḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ ātapo paritāpesī’’tiparikāpī’’tiparikāpī’’ti .

Pañcasatā pañcasatā sī. pī. potthakesu ‘‘pañcasatā’’ti sakideva āgataṃ dijakaññāyo ubhatopassena uḍḍentiḍentiḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā tiṇaṃ vā rajo vā vāto vā ussāvo vā upapphusī’’ti.

Pañcasatā dijakaññāyo purato purato uḍḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ gopālakā vā pasupālakā vā tiṇahārakā vā kaṭṭhahārakā vā vanakammikā vā kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vākathalāya vā pāṇinā vā ( ) (pāsāṇena vā) (syā.) leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā sakkharāhi vāsakkharāya vā pahāraṃ adaṃsu. Māyaṃ kuṇālo sakuṇo gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā idaṃ padadvayaṃ sī. pī. potthakesu natthi thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgamesī’’tisaṅgāmesī’’tisaṅgāmesī’’ti .
Pañcasatā dijakaññāyo pacchato pacchato uḍḍenti saṇhāhi sakhilāhi mañjūhi madhurāhi vācāhi samudācarantiyo – ‘‘māyaṃ kuṇālo sakuṇo āsane pariyukkaṇṭhī’’ti.
Pañcasatā dijakaññāyo disodisaṃ uḍḍenti anekarukkhavividhavikatiphalamāharantiyo – ‘‘māyaṃ kuṇālo sakuṇo khudāya parikilamitthā’’ti.

Atha khalu, bho, tā natthi sī. pī. potthakesu dijakaññāyo taṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ ārāmeneva ārāmaṃ uyyāneneva uyyānaṃ nadītittheneva nadītitthaṃ pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikharaṃ ambavaneneva ambavanaṃ jambuvaneneva jambuvanaṃ labujavaneneva labujavanaṃ nāḷikerasañcāriyeneva sañjādiyeneva (pī.) nāḷikerasañcāriyaṃ khippameva abhisambhonti ratitthāyaratatthāyaratatthāya .

Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo tāhi dijakaññāhi divasaṃ paribyūḷho evaṃ apasādeti – ‘‘nassatha tumhe vasaliyo, vinassatha tumhe vasaliyo, coriyo dhuttiyo asatiyo lahucittāyo katassa appaṭikārikāyo anilo viya yenakāmaṃgamāyo’’ti.
Tasseva khalu, bho, himavato pabbatarājassa puratthimadisābhāge susukhumasunipuṇagirippabhavappabhavāppabhavā – haritupayantiyo.
Uppala paduma kumuda naḷina satapatta sogandhika mandālakamandālavamandālavamandārava sampativirūḷhasucigandha manuññamāvakappadesepāvakappadesepāvakappadese .

Kuravaka-mucalinda-ketaka-vedisa-vañjula vetasamañjula (sī.) -punnāgabakula-tilaka-piyaka-hasanasāla-saḷalacampaka asoka-nāgarukkha-tirīṭi-bhujapatta-lodda-candanoghavanekāḷāgaru-padmaka-piyaṅgu-devadārukacocagahane kakudhakuṭajaaṅkola-kaccikārakacchikāra -kaṇikāra-kaṇṇikāra-kanavera-koraṇḍaka-koviḷāra-kiṃsuka-yodhika vanamallikanavamallikanavamallika -manaṅgaṇa-manavajja-bhaṇḍi-surucira-bhaginimālāmalyadhare jātisumanamadhugandhika- madhukabandhuka (ka.) dhanutakkāridhanukāridhanukārika tālīsa-tagaramusīrakoṭṭha-kacchavitate atimuttakasaṃkusumitalatāvitatapaṭimaṇḍitappadese haṃsa-pilava-kādamba-kāraṇḍavābhinadite vijjādhara-siddha sindhava (sī. pī.) -samaṇa-tāpasagaṇādhivuṭṭhe varadeva-yakkha-rakkhasa-dānava-gandhabba-kinnaramahoragānuciṇṇappadese evarūpe khalu, bho, ramme vanasaṇḍe puṇṇamukho nāma phussakokilo paṭivasati ativiya madhuragiro vilāsitanayano mattakkhosavilāsitanayanamattakkho .

Tasseva khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthisatāni paricārikā dijakaññāyo. Atha khalu, bho, dve dijakaññāyo kaṭṭhaṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ majjhe nisīdāpetvā uḍḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ addhānapariyāyapathe kilamatho ubbāhetthā’’ti.
Paññāsa dijakaññāyo heṭṭhato heṭṭhato uḍḍenti – ‘‘sacāyaṃ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo āsanā paripatissati, mayaṃ taṃ pakkhehi paṭiggahessāmā’’ti.
Paññāsa dijakaññāyo uparūpari uḍḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ ātapo paritāpesī’’ti.
Paññāsa paññāsa dijakaññāyo ubhatopassena uḍḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā tiṇaṃ vā rajo vā vāto vā ussāvo vā upapphusī’’ti.

Paññāsa dijakaññāyo purato purato uḍḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ gopālakā vā pasupālakā vā tiṇahārakā vā kaṭṭhahārakā vā vanakammikā vā kaṭṭhena vā kathalāya vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā sakkharāhi vā pahāraṃ adaṃsu. Māyaṃ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgāmesī’’ti.
Paññāsa dijakaññāyo pacchato pacchato uḍḍenti saṇhāhi sakhilāhi mañjūhi madhurāhi vācāhi samudācarantiyo – ‘‘māyaṃ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo āsane pariyukkaṇṭhī’’ti.
Paññāsa dijakaññāyo disodisaṃ uḍḍenti anekarukkhavividhavikatiphalamāharantiyo – ‘‘māyaṃ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo khudāya parikilamitthā’’ti.

Atha khalu, bho, tā dijakaññāyo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ ārāmeneva ārāmaṃ uyyāneneva uyyānaṃ nadītittheneva nadītitthaṃ pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikharaṃ ambavaneneva ambavanaṃ jambuvaneneva jambuvanaṃ labujavaneneva labujavanaṃ nāḷikerasañcāriyeneva nāḷikerasañcāriyaṃ khippameva abhisambhonti ratitthāya.

Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tāhi dijakaññāhi divasaṃ paribyūḷho evaṃ pasaṃsati – ‘‘sādhu, sādhu, bhaginiyo, etaṃ kho, bhaginiyo, tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kuladhītānaṃ, yaṃ tumhe bhattāraṃ paricareyyāthā’’ti.

Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo yena kuṇālo sakuṇo tenupasaṅkami. Addasaṃsu kho kuṇālassa sakuṇassa paricārikā dijakaññāyo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ; disvāna yena puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ etadavocuṃ – ‘‘ayaṃ, samma puṇṇamukha, kuṇālo sakuṇo ativiya pharuso ativiya pharusavāco, appevanāma tavampi āgamma piyavācaṃ labheyyāmā’’ti. ‘‘Appevanāma, bhaginiyo’’ti vatvā yena kuṇālo sakuṇo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kuṇālena sakuṇena saddhiṃ paṭisammoditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho puṇṇamukho phussakokilo taṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘kissa tvaṃ, samma kuṇāla, itthīnaṃ sujātānaṃ kuladhītānaṃ sammāpaṭipannānaṃ micchāpaṭipanno’si paṭipanno (sī. pī.)? Amanāpabhāṇīnampi kira, samma kuṇāla, itthīnaṃ manāpabhāṇinā bhavitabbaṃ, kimaṅga pana manāpabhāṇīna’’nti!

Evaṃ vutte, kuṇālo sakuṇo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ evaṃ apasādesi – ‘‘nassa tvaṃ, samma jamma vasala, vinassa tvaṃ, samma jamma vasala, ko nu tayā viyatto jāyājinenā’’ti. Evaṃ apasādito ca pana puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tatoyevatato hevatato heva paṭinivatti.

Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa aparena samayena nacirasseva acirasseva accayena (ka.) kharo ābādho uppajji lohitapakkhandikā. Bāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikāmaraṇantikā . Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa paricārikānaṃ dijakaññānaṃ etadahosi – ‘‘ābādhiko kho ayaṃ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo, appevanāma imamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhaheyyā’’ti ekaṃ adutiyaṃ ohāya yena kuṇālo sakuṇo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. Addasā kho kuṇālo sakuṇo tā dijakaññāyo dūratova āgacchantiyo, disvāna tā dijakaññāyo etadavoca – ‘‘kahaṃ pana tumhaṃ vasaliyo bhattā’’ti? ‘‘Ābādhiko kho, samma kuṇāla, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo appevanāma tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhaheyyā’’ti. Evaṃ vutte, kuṇālo sakuṇo tā dijakaññāyo evaṃ apasādesi – ‘‘nassatha tumhe vasaliyo, vinassatha tumhe vasaliyo, coriyo dhuttiyo asatiyo lahucittāyo katassa appaṭikārikāyo anilo viya yenakāmaṃgamāyo’’ti; vatvā yena puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘haṃ, samma, puṇṇamukhā’’ti. ‘‘Haṃ, samma, kuṇālā’’ti.

Atha khalu, bho kuṇālo sakuṇo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ pakkhehi ca mukhatuṇḍakena ca pariggahetvā vuṭṭhāpetvā nānābhesajjāni pāyāpesi. Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa so ābādho paṭippassambhīti. Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ gilānavuṭṭhitaṃgilānāvuṭṭhitaṃgilānāvuṭṭhitaṃgilānāvuṭṭhitaṃ aciravuṭṭhitaṃ gelaññā etadavoca –

‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kaṇhā dvepitikā pañcapatikāya chaṭṭhe purise cittaṃ paṭibandhantiyā, yadidaṃ kabandhekavandhekavandhe pīṭhasappimhīti. Bhavati ca panuttarettha punuttacettha (ka.) evamuparipi vākyaṃ –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Athajjuno nakulo bhīmasenobhimmasenobhimmasenobhimmaseno , yudhiṭṭhilo sahadevosīhadevo ca rājā;
content.gathalast: Ete patī pañca matticca nārī, akāsi khujjavāmanakenakhujjavāmanena pāpa’’nti.
content.paragraph: ‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, saccatapāpīsaccatapāvīsaccatapāvīpañcatapāvī nāma samaṇī susānamajjhe vasantī catutthabhattaṃ pariṇāmayamānā surādhuttakenatulāputtakenatulāputtakenasā surādhuttakena pāpamakāsi.
‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kākavatīkākātīkākāti nāma devī samuddamajjhe vasantī bhariyā venateyyassa naṭakuverena pāpamakāsi.

Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kuruṅgadevīkuraṅgavīkuraṅgavī nāma lomasuddarīlomasundarīlomasundarīlomasundarī eḷamārakaṃeḷikakumāraṃeḷakakumāraṃeḷakamāraṃ kāmayamānā chaḷaṅgakumāradhanantevāsinā pāpamakāsi.
Evañhetaṃ mayā ñātaṃ, brahmadattassa mātaraṃ mātukā (syā.) ohāya kosalarājaṃ pañcālacaṇḍena pāpamakāsi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Etā ca aññā ca akaṃsu pāpaṃ, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissase nappasaṃse;
content.gatha2: Mahī yathā jagati samānarattā, vasundharā itarītarāpatiṭṭhāitarītarānaṃ patiṭṭhāittarītarappatiṭṭhā ;
content.gathalast: Sabbasahā aphandanā akuppā, tathitthiyo tāyo na vissase naro.
Pasayhakhādī parahiṃsane rato, tathitthiyo tāyo na vissase naro.
content.paragraph: ‘‘Na khaluna khalu bhona khalu bho , samma puṇṇamukha, vesiyo nāriyo gamaniyo, na hetā bandhakiyo nāma, vadhikāyo nāma etāyo, yadidaṃ vesiyo nāriyo gamaniyo’’ti.

‘‘Corocorācorācorā viya veṇikatā, madirāvamadirā viyamadirā viyamadiriva diddhādiṭṭhāvisaduṭṭhā vāṇijovāṇijā viya vācāsanthutiyo, issasiṅghamiva viparivattāyoparivattāyoviparivattāro , uragāmiva dujivhāyo, sobbhamiva paṭicchannā, pātālamiva duppūrā rakkhasī viya duttosā, yamovekantahāriyo, sikhīriva sabbabhakkhā, nadīriva sabbavāhī, anilo viya yenakāmaṃcarā, neru viya avisesakarā, visarukkho viya niccaphalitāyo’’ti. Bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ –
content.gathalast: Issasiṅghamiva parivattā mivāvaṭṭo (sī.), mivāvattā (pī.), dujivhādujjivha urago viya.
Rakkhasī viya duttosā, yamovekantahāriyo.

gatha1.note: yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti; (sī. syā.)

content.paragraph: ‘‘Yathā sikhī nadī vāto, nerunāva samāgatā.
content.gatha2: Visarukkho viya niccaphalā, nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ratanantakaritthiyo’’ti yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti; (sī. syā.).
content.paragraph: ‘‘Cattārimāni, samma puṇṇamukha, yāni (vatthūni kicce jāte anatthacarāni bhavanti; tāni) ( ) sī. syā. potthakesu na dissati parakule na vāsetabbāni – goṇaṃ dhenuṃ yānaṃ bhariyā. Cattāri etāni paṇḍito dhanāniyāniyāniyāni gharā na vippavāsaye.
content.gatha1: ‘Goṇaṃ dhenuñca yānañca, bhariyaṃ ñātikule na vāsaye;
content.gatha2: Bhañjanti rathaṃ ayānakā, ativāhena hananti puṅgavaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dohena hananti vacchakaṃ, bhariyā ñātikule padussatī’’’ti.
content.paragraph: ‘‘Cha imāni, samma puṇṇamukha, yāni (vatthūni) ( ) sī. pī. potthakesu nu dissati kicce jāte anatthacarāni bhavanti –
content.gatha1: ‘Aguṇaṃ dhanu ñātikule ca bhariyā, pāraṃ nāvā akkhabhaggañca yānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Dūre mitto pāpasahāyako ca, kicce jāte anatthacarāni bhava’’’nti.
content.paragraph: ‘‘Aṭṭhahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī sāmikaṃ avajānāti. Daliddatā, āturatā, jiṇṇatā, surāsoṇḍatā, muddhatā, pamattatā, sabbakiccesu anuvattanatā, sabbadhanaanuppadānena – imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, aṭṭhahi ṭhānehi itthī sāmikaṃ avajānāti. Bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ –
content.gatha2: Pamattaṃ muddhapattañca, sabbakiccesurattaṃ kiccesurattaṃ kiccesu hāpanaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sabbakāmappadānenasabbakāmapaṇidhānena , avajānātiavajānantiavajānanti sāmika’’’nti.
content.paragraph: ‘‘Navahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharati. Ārāmagamanasīlā ca hoti, uyyānagamanasīlā ca hoti, nadītitthagamanasīlā ca hoti, ñātikulagamanasīlā ca hoti, parakulagamanasīlā ca hoti, ādāsadussamaṇḍanānuyogamanuyuttasīlā ca hoti, majjapāyinī ca hoti, nillokanasīlā ca hoti, sadvāraṭhāyinīpadvāraṭṭhāyinīpadvāraṭṭhāyinīpadvāraṭṭhāyinī ca hoti – imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, navahi ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharatīti. Bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ –
content.gatha1: ‘Ārāmasīlā ca ārāmasīlā (sī. pī.) uyyānaṃ, nadī ñāti parakulaṃ;
content.gathalast: Ādāsadussamaṇḍanamanuyuttā, yā citthī majjapāyinī.
Navahetehi ṭhānehi, padosamāharanti itthiyo’’’ti.
content.paragraph: ‘‘Cattālīsāyacattālīsāyicattālīsāyi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accācaratiaccāvadatiaccāvadatiaccāvadati . Vijambhati, vinamati, vilasati, vilajjati, nakhena nakhaṃ ghaṭṭeti, pādena pādaṃ akkamati, kaṭṭhena pathaviṃ vilikhatilikhatilikhati , dārakaṃ ullaṅghati ullaṅghāpetidārakaṃ ullaṅgheti olaṅghetidārakaṃ ullaṅgheti olaṅgheti , kīḷati kīḷāpeti, cumbati cumbāpeti, bhuñjati bhuñjāpeti, dadāti, yācati, katamanukaroti, uccaṃ bhāsati, nīcaṃ bhāsati, aviccaṃ bhāsati, viviccaṃ bhāsati, naccena gītena vāditena rodanenaroditenaroditena vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati, kaṭiṃ cāleti, guyhabhaṇḍakaṃ sañcāleti, ūruṃ vivarati, ūruṃ pidahati, thanaṃ dasseti, kacchaṃ dasseti, nābhiṃ dasseti, akkhiṃ nikhanati, bhamukaṃ ukkhipati, oṭṭhaṃ upalikhatioṭṭhaṃ palikhati jivhaṃ palikhatioṭṭhaṃ palikhati jivhaṃ palikhati , jivhaṃ nillāleti, dussaṃ muñcati, dussaṃ paṭibandhati, sirasaṃ muñcati, sirasaṃ bandhati – imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, cattālīsāya ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accācarati.

‘‘Pañcavīsāyapañcavīsāhipañcavīsāhi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati. Sāmikassa pavāsaṃ vaṇṇeti, pavuṭṭhaṃ na sarati, āgataṃ nābhinandati, avaṇṇaṃ tassa bhaṇati, vaṇṇaṃ tassa na bhaṇati, anatthaṃ tassa carati, atthaṃ tassa na carati, akiccaṃ tassa karoti, kiccaṃ tassa na karoti, paridahitvā sayati, parammukhī nipajjati, parivattakajātā kho pana hoti kuṅkumiyajātā, dīghaṃ assasati, dukkhaṃ vedayati, uccārapassāvaṃ abhiṇhaṃ gacchati, vilomamācarati, parapurisasaddaṃ sutvā kaṇṇasotaṃ vivaramodahativivarati kamodahati , nihatabhogā kho pana hoti, paṭivissakehi santhavaṃ karoti, nikkhantapādā kho pana hoti, visikhānucārinī aticārinī kho pana hoti, niccaṃ natthi sī. syā. pī. potthakesu sāmike agāravā paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappā, abhiṇhaṃ dvāre tiṭṭhati, kacchāni aṅgāni thanāni dasseti, disodisaṃ gantvā pekkhati – imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, pañcavīsāyapañcavīsāhi ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati. Bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ –
content.gatha1: ‘Pavāsaṃ tassa vaṇṇeti, gataṃ tassa na socatipavāsa’massa vaṇṇeti gatiṃ nānusocatipavāsa’massa vaṇṇeti gatiṃ nānusocati ;
content.gatha2: Disvāna patimāgataṃdisvāpatiṃ āgataṃdisvāpatiṃ āgataṃ nābhinandati;
content.gathalast: Bhattāravaṇṇaṃ na kadāci bhāsati, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
content.gatha1: ‘Anatthaṃ tassa carati asaññatā, atthañca hāpeti akiccakārinī;
content.gathalast: Paridahitvā sayati parammukhī, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
content.gatha1: ‘Parivattajātā caparāvattakajātā ca bhavati kuṅkumī, dīghañca assasati dukkhavedinī;
content.gathalast: Uccārapassāvamabhiṇhaṃ gacchati, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
Nihatabhogā ca karoti santhavaṃ, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
content.gatha1: ‘Kicchena laddhaṃ kasirābhataṃkasirenābhataṃ dhanaṃ, vittaṃ vināseti dukkhena sambhataṃ;
content.gathalast: Paṭivissakehi ca karoti santhavaṃ, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
content.gatha1: ‘Nikkhantapādā visikhānucārinī, niccañca sāmimhiniccaṃ sasāmimhiniccaṃ sasāmimhi paduṭṭhamānasā;
content.gathalast: Aticārinī hoti apetagāravā tatheva’gāravā (sī. pī.), ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
content.gatha1: ‘Abhikkhaṇaṃ tiṭṭhati dvāramūle, thanāni kacchāni ca dassayantī;
content.gathalast: Disodisaṃ pekkhati bhantacittā, ete paduṭṭhāya bhavanti lakkhaṇā.
Sabbitthiyo kare pāpaṃ, labhamāne nivātake.
content.gatha1: ‘Sace labhetha khaṇaṃ vā raho vā, nivātakaṃ vāpi labhetha tādisaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sabbāva itthī kareyyu nokayiruṃ nukareyyuṃ no pāpaṃ, aññaṃ alatthaaladdhāaladdhāaladdhā pīṭhasappināpi saddhiṃ.
Sabbattha nāpītikarāpisabba’ttanā’pītikārāpisabba’ttanā’pītikārāpi ce siyāsiyuṃ , na vissase titthasamā hi nāriyo’’ti.
content.gatha1: ‘Yaṃ ve yañca (syā. ka.) disvā kinnarakinnarīnaṃkaṇḍarīkinnarānaṃkinnarīkinnarānaṃ , sabbitthiyo na ramanti agāre;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tādisaṃ maccaṃ cajitvā bhariyā, aññaṃ disvā purisaṃ pīṭhasappiṃ.
Avācarīaccācarianācari paṭṭhavasānugassabaddhavasānugassabaddhavasānugassapattavasānugatassa , kaṃ vāpi itthī nāticare tadaññaṃ.
Avācarī paṭṭhavasānugassa, taṃ vāpi sā nājjhagā kāmakāminī.
content.gatha1: ‘Luddhānaṃ khuddānaṃ (sī. syā. pī.) lahucittānaṃ, akataññūna dubbhinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Nādevasatto puriso, thīnaṃ saddhātumarahati.
content.gatha1: ‘Na tā pajānanti kataṃ na kiccaṃ, na mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhātaraṃ vā;
content.gathalast: Anariyā samatikkantadhammā, sasseva cittassa vasaṃ vajanti.
content.gatha1: ‘Cirānuvuṭṭhampicirānuvutthampicirānuvutthampi piyaṃ manāpaṃ, anukampakaṃ pāṇasamampi bhattuṃ santaṃ (sī. syā. pī.);
content.gathalast: Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissasāmi.
content.gatha1: ‘Thīnañhi cittaṃ yathā vānarassa, kannappakannaṃ yathā rukkhachāyā;
content.gathalast: Calācalaṃ hadayamitthiyānaṃ, cakkassa nemi viya parivattati.
content.gatha1: ‘Yadā tā passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ;
content.gathalast: Saṇhāhi vācāhi nayanti menaṃ, kambojakā jalajeneva assaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘Yadā na passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ;
content.gathalast: Samantato naṃ parivajjayanti, tiṇṇo nadīpāragatova kullaṃ.
Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃorakulaṃ parañca.
content.gatha1: ‘Na tā ekassa na dvinnaṃ, āpaṇova pasārito;
content.gathalast: Yo tā mayhanti maññeyya, vātaṃ jālena bādhayebandhayebandhaye .
content.gatha1: ‘Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati kesuci potthakesu imissā gāthāya pubbaddhāparaddhaṃ vipariyāyena dissati.
Gāvo bahitiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘Ghatāsanaṃ kuñjaraṃ kaṇhasappaṃ, muddhābhisittaṃ pamadā ca sabbā;
content.gathalast: Ete naroetena so niccayatoniccayattoniccayatto bhajetha, tesaṃ have dubbidu sabbabhāvosaccabhāvo .
content.gatha1: ‘Naccantavaṇṇā na bahūnaṃ kantā, na dakkhiṇā pamadā sevitabbā;
content.gathalast: Na parassa bhariyā na dhanassa hetu, etitthiyo pañca na sevitabbā’’’.
content.paragraph: Atha khalu, bho, ānando gijjharājā kuṇālassa sakuṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃādimajjhagāthāpariyosānaṃādimajjhagāthāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
content.gathalast: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃtasmā hi itthīnaṃtasmā hi itthīnaṃ na vissasāmi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na vissase icchati manti poso, na vissase rodati me sakāse;
content.gathalast: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca.
Na vissase rājānaṃ sakhārājā sakhārājā sakhā mamanti, na vissase itthi dasanna mātaraṃ.
Accantapemānugatassa bhariyā, na vissase titthasamā hi nāriyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘haneyyu chindeyyuṃpi chadayeyyuṃhaneyyu chindeyyuṃpi chadayeyyuṃHaneyyuṃ chindeyyuṃ chedāpeyyumpihaneyyuṃpi chindeyyuṃpi chedāpeyyuṃpi , kaṇṭhepikaṇṭhampikaṇṭhampi chetvā rudhiraṃ piveyyuṃ;
content.gathalast: Mā dīnakāmāsu asaññatāsu, bhāvaṃ kare gaṅgatitthūpamāsu.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Musā tāsaṃ yathā saccaṃ, saccaṃ tāsaṃ yathā musā;
content.gathalast: Gāvo bahitiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
Athopi dunnivatthena, mañjunā bhaṇitena ca.
Na tā kiñci na jānanti, yaṃ manussesu vañcanaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
content.gathalast: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā.
Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca.
Dhanattādhanatthā paṭivallanti, latāva dumanissitā.
Chavaḍāhakaṃ pupphachaḍḍakaṃ, sadhanamanupatanti nāriyo.
Anugacchantigacchanti anupatanti, dhanahetu hi nāriyo’’tidhanahetu ca nāriyodhanahetu nāriyo .
content.paragraph: Atha khalu, bho, nārado devabrāhmaṇo ānandassa gijjharājassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
content.gatha1: ‘‘Cattārome na pūrenti, te me suṇātha bhāsato;
content.gathalast: Samuddo brāhmaṇo rājā, itthī cāpi dijampati.
Tā samuddaṃ na pūrenti, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
Bhiyyopi sutamiccheyya, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
content.gatha2: Ajjhāvasaṃ vijinitvā, anantaratanocitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pāraṃ samuddaṃ pattheti, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
content.gatha2: Sūrā ca balavanto ca, sabbakāmarasāharā;
content.gathalast: Kareyya navame chandaṃ, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
Sabbitthiyo kaṇṭakānaṃva sākhā, sabbitthiyo dhanahetu vajanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vātañca jālena naro parāmase, osiñcaye osañciyā (sī. pī.) sāgaramekapāṇinā;
content.gathalast: Sakena hatthena kareyya ghosaṃsakena kālena haneyya ghosanaṃ , yo sabbabhāvaṃ pamadāsu osaje.
Thīnaṃ bhāvo durājāno, macchassevodake gataṃ.
Sīdanti naṃ viditvāna, ārakā parivajjaye.
Sīdanti naṃ viditvāna, ārakā parivajjaye.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ etāyañcetā upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā;
content.gathalast: Jātavedova saṇṭhānaṃ, khippaṃ anudahanti na’’nti.
content.paragraph: Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo nāradassa devabrāhmaṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
content.gathalast: Uggatejamuragampi āside, eko ekāya pamadāya nālapeeko ekapamadaṃ hi nālapeeko ekapamādāya nālape .
Bādhayanti anupaṭṭhitassatiṃanupaṭṭhitāsatī , dīpe rakkhasigaṇova dīparakkhasigaṇāva (sī.) vāṇije.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Natthi tāsaṃ vinayo na saṃvaro, majjamaṃsaniratāmajjamaṃsābhiratā asaññatā;
content.gathalast: Tā gilanti purisassa pābhataṃ, sāgareva makaraṃ timiṅgalotimiṅgilotimiṅgilo .
Osaranti pamadā pamādinaṃ, loṇatoyavatiyaṃva āpakā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ naraṃ upalapentiuparamantiuparamantipalāpenti nāriyo, chandasā va ratiyā dhanena vā;
content.gathalast: Jātavedasadisampi tādisaṃ, rāgadosavadhiyorāgadosavatiyorāgadosavatiyo dahanti naṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aḍḍhaṃ ñatvā purisaṃ mahaddhanaṃ, osaranti sadhanā sahattanā;
content.gathalast: Rattacittamativeṭhayanti naṃ, sāla māluvalatāva kānane.
Uhasantiūhasantiūhasantiohasanti pahasanti nāriyo, sambarovasaṃvarovasaṃvarovasaṃvarova satamāyakovidā.
Rakkhitā aticaranti sāmikaṃ, dānavaṃva hadayantarassitāhadayantanissitāhadayantaranissitā .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tejavāpi hi naro vicakkhaṇo, sakkato bahujanassa pūjito;
content.gathalast: Nārinaṃ vasagato na bhāsati, rāhunā upahatova candimā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ kareyya kupito diso disaṃ, duṭṭhacitto vasamāgataṃ ariṃariari ;
content.gathalast: Tena bhiyyo byasanaṃ nigacchati, nārinaṃ vasagato apekkhavā.
Hīnamevupagatā hi nāriyo, tā ramanti kuṇapeva makkhikā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā, rājadhāninigamesu vā punavā pana ;
content.gathalast: Oḍḍitaṃ namucipāsavākaraṃ vāguraṃ (syā.), cakkhumā parivajje sukhatthiko.
Devatāhi nirayaṃ nimissati, chedagāmimaṇiyaṃva vāṇijo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘So idha garahito parattha ca, dummatī upahatoupagatoupagato sakammunā;
content.paragraph: Gacchatī aniyato gaḷāgaḷaṃ, duṭṭhagadrabharathova uppathe.
content.gathalast: Āvasitvā tiracchānayoniyaṃ, petarājavisayaṃ na muñcatimuccati .
Nāsayanti pamadā pamādinaṃ, duggatiñca paṭipādayanti naṃ.
Soṇṇabyamhanilayāsuvaṇṇabyamhanilayāsuvaṇṇabyamhanilayāsovaṇṇabyamhanilayā ca accharā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kāmadhātusamatikkamā gati, rūpadhātuyā bhāvorūpadhātuyā bhavorūpadhātusambhavo na dullabho;
content.gathalast: Vītarāgavisayūpapattiyā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā.
Nibbutehi sucihī na dullabhaṃ, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā’’ti.
content.gatha2: Ānando gijjharājāsi, sāriputto ca nārado;
content.gathalast: Parisā buddhaparisā, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka’’nti.
content.paragraph: 537. Mahāsutasomajātakaṃ (5)
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisāni, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni;
content.gathalast: Hanāsi itthī purise ca mūḷho, maṃsassa hetu aduāduādu dhanassa kāraṇā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Naṃ attahetū na dhanassa kāraṇā, na puttadārassa sahāyañātinaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bhattā ca me bhagavā bhūmipālo, so khādati maṃsaṃ bhadantedisaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace tuvaṃ bhatturatthe payutto, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni;
content.gathalast: Pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, lapeyyāsi me rājino sammukhe taṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tathā karissāmi ahaṃ bhadante, yathā tuvaṃyameva tvaṃ bhāsasi kāḷahatthi;
content.gathalast: Pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, vakkhāmi te rājino sammukhe taṃ’’.
content.gatha2: Kāḷo rasakamādāya, rājānaṃ upasaṅkami;
content.gathalast: Upasaṅkammaupasaṅkamitvāupasaṅkamitvāupasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ, idaṃ vacanamabravi.
Hanati itthipurise, tuvaṃ maṃsāni khādasi’’.
Mama atthaṃ karontassa, kimetaṃ paribhāsasi’’.
Parikkhīṇāya parisāya, attānaṃ khādiyā mato.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ pamatto rasagārave rattoratoratorato , bālo yadī āyati nāvabujjhati;
content.gathalast: Vidhamma putte cajicajitvā ñātake ca, parivattiya attānaññevaattānamevaattānameva khādati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Idaṃ te sutvāna vigetuvihetuvihetu chando, mā bhakkhayīmā bhakkhasīmā bhakkhasī rāja manussamaṃsaṃ;
content.gathalast: Mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalaṃ vārijova, dvipadādhipa dipadādipa (sī. pī.) evamuparipi suññamakāsi raṭṭhaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sujāto nāma nāmena, oraso tassa atrajotassa orasa atrajotassa atraja oraso ;
content.gathalast: Jambupesimaladdhāna, mato so tassa saṅkhaye.
Aladdhā mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, maññe hissāmihessāmihessāmihassāmi jīvitaṃ’’.
Na tvaṃ arahasi tāta, abhakkhaṃ bhakkhayetave’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Rasānaṃ aññataraṃ etaṃ, kasmāyasmāyasmā maṃ tvaṃ nivāraye;
content.gathalast: Sohaṃ tattha gamissāmi, yattha lacchāmi edisaṃ.
Yassa me dassanena tvaṃ, nābhinandasi brāhmaṇa’’.
Tvañca jamma vinassassu, yattha pattaṃ na taṃ suṇe’’.
Pabbājessanti taṃ raṭṭhā, soṇḍaṃ māṇavakaṃ yathā’’.
Accharaṃ kāmayantova, na so bhuñji na so pivi.
Evaṃ mānusakā kāmā, dibbakāmāna santike.
Aladdhā mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, maññe hissāmi jīvitaṃ’’.
Abhuttaparibhogenaavuttiparibhogenaavuttiparibhogenaayuttaparibhogena , sabbe abbhatthataṃ gatā.
Abhakkhaṃ rāja bhakkhesi, tasmā pabbājayanti taṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Tiṭṭhāhīti mayā vutto, so tvaṃ gacchasi pammukhopāmukho ;
content.gatha2: Aṭṭhito tvaṃ ṭhitomhīti, lapasi brahmacārini;
content.gathalast: Idaṃ te samaṇāyuttaṃ, asiñca me maññasi kaṅkapattaṃkaṅkhapattaṃkaṅkhapattaṃ’’ .
Corañca loke aṭhitaṃ vadanti, āpāyikaṃ nerayikaṃ ito cutaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sace tvaṃ saddahasisacepi sahasisacepi sahasi rāja, sutaṃ gaṇhāhi khattiyakhattiyaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Tena yaññaṃ yajitvāna, evaṃ saggaṃ gamissasi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kismiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmijātabhūmi , atha kena atthena idhānupatto;
content.gathalast: Akkhāhi me brāhmaṇa etamatthaṃ, kimicchasī demi tayajja patthitaṃ’’.
Taveva atthāya idhāgatosmi, suṇohi gāthā paramatthasaṃhitā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na ve rudanti matimanto sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭṭhānacintino;
content.gathalast: Dīpañhi etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ, yaṃ paṇḍitā sokanudā bhavanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Attānaṃ ñātī udāhuudauda puttadāraṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kimeva tvaṃkimo nu tvaṃkimo nu tvaṃ sutasomānutappe, korabyaseṭṭha vacanaṃ suṇoma tetaṃ’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nevāhamattānamanutthunāmi, na puttadāraṃ na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;
content.gathalast: Satañca dhammo carito purāṇo, taṃ saṅkaraṃsaṅgaraṃsaṅgaraṃsaṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇassānutappe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kato mayā saṅkaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇasappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissaṃ’’.
Amittahatthaṃ punarāvajeyya, korabyaseṭṭha na hi maṃ upesi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
content.gathalast: Madhuraṃ piyaṃ jīvitaṃ laddha rāja, kuto tuvaṃ ehisi me sakāsaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mataṃ vareyya parisuddhasīlo, na jīvitaṃna hi jīvitaṃ garahito pāpadhammo;
content.gathalast: Na hi taṃ naraṃ tāyatitāyatetāyatetāyatetāyate duggatīhi, yassāpi hetu alikaṃ bhaṇeyya.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sacepi vāto girimāvaheyya, cando ca sūriyo ca chamā pateyyuṃ;
content.gathalast: Sabbā ca najjo paṭisotaṃ vajeyyuṃ, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati ‘‘Nabhaṃ phaleyya udadhīpi susse, saṃvaṭṭaye bhūtadharā vasundharā;
content.gathalast: Siluccayo meru samūlamuppate, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyyaṃ’’ ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Asiñca sattiñca parāmasāmi, sapathampi te samma ahaṃ karomi;
content.gathalast: Tayā pamutto anaṇo bhavitvā, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo te kato saṅkaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇasappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajassu’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo me kato saṅkaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
content.gathalast: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇasappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mutto ca so porisādassa hatthā, gantvāna taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca;
content.gathalast: Suṇomasuṇomisuṇomi gāthāyo satārahāyo, yā me sutā assu hitāya brahme’’.
Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahusaṅgamo.
Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
content.gathalast: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nabhañcaṃ dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
content.gathalast: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammodhammaṃdhammaṃ asatañca rāja’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sahassiyāsahassiyosahassiyo imā gāthā, na imā,na imā,nahimānayimā gāthā satārahā;
content.gathalast: Cattāri tvaṃ sahassāni, khippaṃ gaṇhāhi brāhmaṇa’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Āsītiyā nāvutiyāasītiyā navutiyā ca gāthā, satārahā cāpi bhaveyyabhaveyyubhaveyyubhaveyyu gāthā;
content.gathalast: Paccattameva sutasoma jānahi, sahassiyā nāma kā atthisahassiyo nāma idhatthi gāthā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Icchāmi vohaṃ sutavuddhimattano, santoti maṃsanto mamaṃsanto ca maṃsanto ca maṃsanto ca maṃ sappurisā bhajeyyuṃ;
content.gathalast: Ahaṃ savantīhi mahodadhīva, na hi tāta tappāmi subhāsitena.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Aggi yathā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ dahanto, na tappatī sāgarovasāgaro vāsāgaro vā nadīhi;
content.gathalast: Evampi te paṇḍitā rājaseṭṭha, sutvā na tappanti subhāsitena.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sakassa dāsassa yadā suṇomi, gāthaṃ ahaṃ atthavatiṃgāthā ahaṃ atthavatīgāthā ahaṃ atthavatī janinda;
content.gathalast: Tameva sakkacca nisāmayāmi, na hi tāta dhammesu mamatthi titti’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sayoggaṃ, sakāyuraṃ sabbakāmūpapannaṃ;
content.gathalast: Kiṃ kāmahetu paribhāsasimaṃbhāsase maṃbhāsase maṃbhāsase maṃ , gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatte’’porisādassa kanteporisādassa kanteporisādassupante .
content.gatha1: ‘‘Attānurakkhāya bhavanti hete, hatthārohā rathikā pattikā ca;
content.gathalast: Assāruhāassārohāassārohā ye ca dhanuggahāse, senaṃ payuñjāma hanāma sattuṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sudukkaraṃ porisādo akāsi, jīvaṃ gahetvāna avassajī maṃ;
content.gathalast: Taṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ saranto, dubbhe ahaṃ tassa kathaṃ janinda’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Vanditvā so pitaraṃ mātarañca, anusāsetvā negamañca balañca;
content.gathalast: Saccavādī saccānurakkhamāno, agamāsi so yattha porisādo’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Kato mayā saṅkaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
content.gatha2: Taṃ saṅkaraṃ brāhmaṇasappadāya, saccānurakkhī punarāgatosmi;
content.gathalast: Yajassu yaññaṃ khāda maṃ porisāda’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na hāyate khāditaṃkhādituṃkhādituṃkhādituṃ mayhaṃ pacchā, citakā ayaṃ tāva sadhūmikāvasadhūmakā ca ;
content.gathalast: Niddhūmake pacitaṃ sādhupakkaṃ, suṇomasuṇomisuṇāma gāthāyo satārahāyo’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Adhammiko tvaṃ porisādakāsiporisādamakāsi , raṭṭhā ca bhaṭṭho udarassa hetu;
content.gathalast: Dhammañcimā abhivadanti gāthā, dhammo ca adhammo ca kuhiṃ sameti.
Natthi saccaṃ kuto dhammo, kiṃ sutena karissasi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo maṃsahetu migavaṃ careyya, yo vā hane purisamattahetu;
content.gathalast: Ubhopi te pecca samā bhavanti, kasmā nokasmā nu adhammikaṃ brūsi maṃ tvaṃ’’.
Abhakkhaṃ rāja bhakkhesi, tasmā adhammiko tuvaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
content.gathalast: Amittahatthaṃ punarāgatosi, na khattadhamme kusalosi rāja’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye khattadhamme kusalā bhavanti, pāyena te nerayikā bhavanti;
content.gatha2: Tasmā ahaṃ khattadhammaṃ pahāya, saccānurakkhī punarāgatosmi;
content.gathalast: Yajassu yaññaṃ khāda maṃ porisāda’’.
Sabbaṃ tahiṃ labhasilabbhati sāmitāya, saccena kiṃ passasi ānisaṃsaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ye kecime atthi rasā pathabyā, saccaṃ tesaṃ sādhutaraṃ rasānaṃ;
content.paragraph: Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, taranti jātimaraṇassa pāraṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
content.gatha2: Amittahatthaṃ punarāgatosi, na hi nūna te maraṇabhayaṃ janinda;
content.gathalast: Alīnacitto asica’sica’sica’si saccavādī’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Katā me kalyāṇā anekarūpā, yaññā yiṭṭhā ye vipulā pasatthā;
content.gathalast: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Katā me kalyāṇā anekarūpā, yaññā yiṭṭhā ye vipulā pasatthā;
content.gathalast: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ adakhādakhādakhāda maṃ porisāda.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ñātīsu mittesu katā me kārā katūpakāro (syā. ka.), dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ñātīsuṃ mittesu katā me kārā, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
content.gathalast: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dinnaṃ me dānaṃ bahudhā bahūnaṃ, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
content.gathalast: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Dinnaṃ me dānaṃ bahudhā bahūnaṃ, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
content.gathalast: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda’’.
Muddhāpi tassa viphaleyyavipateyyavipateyya sattadhā, yo tādisaṃ saccavādiṃ adeyya’’.
Api gāthā suṇitvāna, dhamme me ramateramatīramatī mano’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Sakideva mahārāja sutasoma (sī. pī.), sabbhi hoti samāgamo;
content.gathalast: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahusaṅgamo.
Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
content.gathalast: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Nabhañcaṃ dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
content.gathalast: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammodhammaṃdhammaṃ asatañca rāja’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Gāthā imā atthavatī subyañjanā, subhāsitā tuyha janinda sutvā;
content.gathalast: Ānandi vitto sumano patīto, cattāri te samma vare dadāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo nattano maraṇaṃ bujjhasi tuvaṃbujjhase tvaṃbujjhase tvaṃbujjhase tuvaṃ , hitāhitaṃ vinipātañca saggaṃ;
content.gathalast: Giddho rase duccarite niviṭṭho, kiṃ tvaṃ varaṃ dassasi pāpadhamma.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ahañca taṃ dehi varanti vajjaṃ, tvañcāpi datvāna avākareyya;
content.gathalast: Sandiṭṭhikaṃ kalahamimaṃ vivādaṃ, ko paṇḍito jānamupabbajeyya’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvāna avākareyya;
content.gathalast: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassameva’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃsakkhisakkhisakkhi , paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
content.gathalast: Passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃārogyaṃ , etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ varāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃ, paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
content.gathalast: Passāsi maṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ dadāmi’’.
Na tādise bhūmipatī adesi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ varāmi’’.
Na tādise bhūmipatī ademi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ dadāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Parosataṃ khattiyā te gahitā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
content.gathalast: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāhi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ varāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Parosataṃ khattiyā me gahitā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
content.gathalast: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāmisakena raṭṭhena paṭipādayāmi te , etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ dadāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Chiddaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ byathitābyathitaṃbyādhitaṃ bhayā hi, puthū narā leṇamanuppaviṭṭhā;
content.gathalast: Manussamaṃsaṃ viramehiviramāhi rāja, etaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā hi so bhakkho mamamamaṃmamaṃmamaṃ manāpo, etassa hetumhihetumpi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
content.gathalast: Sohaṃ kathaṃ etto upārameyyaṃ, aññaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varassu’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Naṃ ve piyaṃ meti janinda tādiso, attaṃ niraṃkaccaniraṃkatvāniraṃkatvāniraṃkatvā piyāni sevati;
content.gathalast: Attāva seyyo paramā ca paramāva (bahūsu) jā. 1.6.81 saṃsandetabbaṃ seyyo, labbhā piyā ocitatthenaocitattena pacchā’’.
Namhi sakkānamhi sakkonamhi sakko nivāretuṃ, aññaṃaññaṃ tuvaṃaññaṃ tuvaṃaññaṃ tuvaṃ varaṃ samma varassu’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo ve piyaṃ meti piyānurakkhīpiyānukaṅkhīpiyānukaṅkhī , attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
content.gathalast: Soṇḍova pitvā visamissapānaṃpītvana visassa thālaṃpītvana visassa thālaṃpitvā visamissathālaṃpitvā visamissathālaṃ , teneva so hoti dukkhī parattha.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yo cīdha saṅkhāya piyāni hitvā, kicchenapi sevati ariyadhammeariyadhammaṃariyadhammaṃ ;
content.gathalast: Dukkhitova pitvāna yathosadhāni, teneva so hoti sukhī parattha’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Ohāyahaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, manāpiye kāmaguṇe ca kāmaguṇepi (syā. ka.) pañca;
content.gathalast: Etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadāmi’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na paṇḍitā diguṇamāhu vākyaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
content.gathalast: Varassu samma iti maṃ avoca, iccabravī tvaṃ na hi te sameti’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Apuññalābhaṃ ayasaṃ akittiṃ, pāpaṃ bahuṃ duccaritaṃ kilesaṃ;
content.gathalast: Manussamaṃsassa kate bhavo (syā. ka.) upāgā, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadeyyaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Naṃ taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvāna avākareyya;
content.gathalast: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassameva’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇaṃ cajanti santo nāpi dhammaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
content.gathalast: Datvā varaṃ khippamavākarohi, etena sampajja surājaseṭṭha.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Caje dhanaṃdhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetuyo pana aṅgahetuyo pana aṅgahetu , aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
content.gathalast: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yasmā hi dhammaṃ puriso vijaññā, ye cassa kaṅkhaṃ vinayanti santo;
content.gathalast: Taṃ hissa dīpañca parāyaṇañca, na tena mittiṃ jirayethajarayethajarayetha pañño.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā hi so bhakkho mama manāpo, etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
content.gathalast: Sace ca maṃ yācasi etamatthaṃ, etampi te samma varaṃ dadāmi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Satthā ca me hosi sakhā ca mesi, vacanampi te samma ahaṃ akāsiṃ;
content.gathalast: Tuvampitvaṃpitvaṃpi me samma karohi vākyaṃ, ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāma’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Satthā ca te homi sakhā ca tyamhi, vacanampi me samma tuvaṃ akāsi;
content.gathalast: Ahampi te samma karomi vākyaṃ, ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāma’’.
Na jātu dubbhetha imassa rañño, saccappaṭiññaṃ me paṭissuṇātha’’.
Na jātu dubbhema imassa rañño, saccappaṭiññaṃ te paṭissuṇāma’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yathā pitā vā atha vāpi mātā, anukampakā atthakāmā pajānaṃ;
content.gathalast: evamevaEvameva voevampi vo hotu ayañca rājā, tumhe ca vo hotha yatheva puttā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yathā pitā vā atha vāpi mātā, anukampakā atthakāmā pajānaṃ;
content.gathalast: Evameva no hotu evampi no (syā.) ayañca rājā, mayampi hessāma yathevatatheva puttā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Catuppadaṃ sakuṇañcāpi maṃsaṃ, sūdehi randhaṃ sukataṃ suniṭṭhitaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sudhaṃva indo paribhuñjiyāna, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
Indaṃva devesu pamodayiṃsu, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
Seyyassasayanassasayanassasayanassasayanassa majjhamhi sukhaṃ sayitvā, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Pāṇissaraṃ kumbhathūṇaṃ nisīthe, athopi ve nippurisampi tūriyaṃ;
content.gathalast: Bahuṃ sugītañca suvāditañca, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
Hayehi nāgehi rathehupetaṃ, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe’’.
Kāḷapakkhūpamo rāja, asataṃ hoti samāgamo.
Akāsiṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yena gacchāmi duggatiṃ.
Sukkapakkhūpamo rāja, sataṃ hoti samāgamo.
Kāhāmi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, yena gacchāmi suggatiṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Thale yathā vāri janinda vuṭṭhaṃvaṭṭaṃvaṭṭaṃ , anaddhaneyyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitīkaṃ;
content.gathalast: Evampi hoti asataṃ samāgamo, anaddhaneyyo udakaṃ thaleva.
Evampi veevampi meevampi ceevampi ce hoti sataṃ samāgamo, ciraṭṭhitīkociraṭṭhitikaṃ udakaṃ sareva.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Abyāyiko hoti sataṃ samāgamo, yāvampi tiṭṭheyya tatheva hoti;
content.gathalast: Khippañhi veti asataṃ samāgamo, tasmā sataṃ dhammo asabbhi ārakā’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na so rājā yorājā na so yo ajeyyaṃ jināti, na so sakhā yo sakhāraṃ jināti;
content.gathalast: Na sā bhariyā yā patino na vibheti, na te puttāputtā na te ye na bharanti jiṇṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo, na te santosanto na te ye na bhaṇanti dhammaṃ;
content.gathalast: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, dhammaṃ bhaṇantāva bhavanti santo.
Bhāsamānañca jānanti, desentaṃ amataṃ padaṃ.
Subhāsitaddhajā isayo, dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajo’’ti.
content.paragraph: Tassuddānaṃ –
content.gatha1: Sumukho pana haṃsavaro ca mahā, sudhabhojaniko ca paro pavaro;
content.gathalast: Sakuṇāladijādhipativhayano, sutasomavaruttamasavhayanoti.
